Instance.description: A Picker Interaction that changes the name of the interaction and bypasses the picker if only one option is available.

TunableVariant.name: single_choice_display_name
TunableVariant.description:
The name of the interaction if only one option is available. There should be a single token for the item that's used. The token will be replaced with the name of a Sim in Sim Pickers, or an object for recipes, etc.
Picked Sim/Picked Object participants can be used as display name tokens.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description:
The name of the interaction if only one option is available. There should be a single token for the item that's used. The token will be replaced with the name of a Sim in Sim Pickers, or an object for recipes, etc.
Picked Sim/Picked Object participants can be used as display name tokens.
